sqlMap.select: select trc.rect_id, trc.prcd_id, trc.lease_code, trc.cust_name, trc.corp_oragnization_code, trc.open_bank, trc.bank_accounts, trc.CUST_PHONE, trc.CUST_FAX, trc.CUST_LINKMAN, trc.Cust_Zip, trc.CUST_ADDRESS, trc.PROVINCE_ID, trc.province_id, ta.name as province_name, trc.city_id, ta2.name as city_name, tpc.lease_code as credit_lease_code, tcc.cust_name as credit_cust_name, tpcc.organization_code_certificate as credit_corp_oragnization_code, tpca.bank_name as credit_open_bank, tpca.bank_account as credit_bank_accounts, tpcc.telephone as credit_CUST_PHONE, tpcc.fax as credit_CUST_FAX, tpcc.link_man as credit_CUST_LINKMAN, tpcc.postcode as credit_Cust_Zip, tpcc.registered_office_address as credit_CUST_ADDRESS, tpc.province_id as credit_province_id, ta3.name as credit_province_name, tpc.city_id as credit_city_id, ta4.name as credit_city_name, tcc.CUST_TYPE, trc.NATU_IDCARD, trc.NATU_MATE_NAME, trc.NATU_MATE_IDCARD, tpn.NATU_IDCARD as credit_NATU_IDCARD, tpn.MATE_NAME, tpn.MATE_IDCARD, tpn.HOME_ADDR, tpn.MOBILE_PHONE, tpn.NATU_FAX, tpn.NATU_ZIP, tpn.NATU_LINKMAN, trc.CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS, trc.CORP_WORK_ADDRESS, tpcc.REGISTERED_OFFICE_ADDRESS as credit_CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS, tpcc.COMMON_OFFICE_ADDRESS as credit_CORP_WORK_ADDRESS from t_rent_contract trc left join t_area ta on trc.province_id = ta.id left join t_area ta2 on trc.city_id = ta2.id left join t_prjt_credit tpc on trc.prcd_id = tpc.id and tpc.status = 0 left join t_cust_customer tcc on tpc.cust_id = tcc.cust_id left join t_prjt_creditcustomercorp tpcc on tpcc.credit_id = tpc.id and tpcc.status = 0 left join t_prjt_creditcorpbankaccount tpca on tpca.credit_id = tpc.id and tpca.status = 0 and tpca.state = 0 left join t_area ta3 on tpc.province_id = ta3.id left join t_area ta4 on tpc.city_id = ta4.id left join t_prjt_natunal tpn on tpn.credit_id = tpc.id and tpn.status = 0 where trc.rect_id = #rect_id#

select trcs.recs_id, trcs.lease_topric, trcs.LEASE_PERIOD, trcs.lease_term, trcs.PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE, trcs.PLEDGE_PRICE, trcs.HEAD_HIRE_PERCENT, trcs.HEAD_HIRE, trcs.MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE, trcs.MANAGEMENT_FEE, trcs.BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE, trcs.FLOAT_RATE, trcs.YEAR_INTEREST, trcs.YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE, trcs.FINE_RATE, trcs.FINE_TYPE, trcs.LEASE_RZE, trcs.PAY_WAY, trcs.START_DATE, trcs.EQUPMENT_ADDRESS, trcs.DEAL_WAY, trcs.BUY_INSURANCE_WAY, trcs.INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID, trcs.BUY_INSURANCE_TIME, trcs.INSURE_REBATE_RATE, tic.incp_name, trcs.PLEDGE_PERIOD, trcs.PLEDGE_WAY, trcs.SALES_TAX_RATE, trcs.INSURE_BASE_RATE, trcs.STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC, trcs.STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC from t_rent_contractschema trcs left join t_insu_company tic on tic.incp_id=trcs.insurance_company_id where trcs.rect_id = #rect_id# and trcs.status=0

select tpcs.lease_course, tpcs.lease_topric, tpcs.lease_term, tpcs.PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE, tpcs.PLEDGE_PRICE, tpcs.HEAD_HIRE_PERCENT, tpcs.HEAD_HIRE, tpcs.MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE, tpcs.MANAGEMENT_FEE, tpcs.BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE, tpcs.FLOAT_RATE, tpcs.YEAR_INTEREST, tpcs.YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE, tpcs.FINE_RATE, tpcs.FINE_TYPE, tpcs.LEASE_RZE, tpcs.PAY_WAY, tpcs.START_DATE, tpcs.EQUPMENT_ADDRESS, tpcs.DEAL_WAY, tpcs.BUY_INSURANCE_WAY, tpcs.INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID, tpcs.BUY_INSURANCE_TIME, tpcs.INSURE_REBATE_RATE, tic.incp_name, tpcs.PLEDGE_PERIOD, tpcs.PLEDGE_WAY, tpcs.SALES_TAX_RATE, tpcs.INSURE_BASE_RATE, tpcs.STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC, tpcs.STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC from t_prjt_creditscheme tpcs left join t_insu_company tic on tic.incp_id=tpcs.INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID where tpcs.credit_id = #credit_id# and tpcs.status=0

select THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT, UNIT, sum(unit_price) total from t_prjt_creditequipment tpce where tpce.credit_id = #credit_id# group by THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, UNIT order by THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, UNIT

select THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, sum(AMOUNT) AMOUNT, UNIT, sum(unit_price) total from t_rent_contractdetail tpce where tpce.rect_id = #rect_id# and tpce.status=0 group by THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, UNIT order by THING_KIND, THING_NAME, MODEL_SPEC, brand, STAYBUY_PRICE, UNIT_PRICE, UNIT

select tiit.intp_name, tpci.start_date, tpci.end_date, tpci.insure_rate, tpci.insure_price, tpci.memo from t_prjt_creditinsure tpci left join t_insu_insuretype tiit on tpci.insure_item = tiit.intp_id where tpci.credit_id = #credit_id# and tpci.status = 0

select trci.reci_id, tiit.intp_name, trci.start_date, trci.end_date, trci.insure_rate, trci.insure_price, trci.memo from t_rent_contractinsure trci left join t_insu_insuretype tiit on trci.insure_item = tiit.intp_id where trci.rect_id = #rect_id# and trci.status = 0
select trco.reco_id,trco.other_name, trco.other_price, substring(trco.other_date,0,11) other_date, trco.memo from t_rent_contractotherfee trco where trco.rect_id = #rect_id# and trco.status = 0
select tpco.other_name, tpco.other_price, CONVERT(varchar,tpco.other_date,23) other_date, tpco.memo from t_prjt_creditotherprice tpco where tpco.credit_id = #credit_id# and tpco.status = 0
sqlMap.insert:
insert into T_RENT_CONTRACTCHECK ( RECT_ID, RECC_TYPE, STATUS, LEASE_CODE_A, LEASE_CODE_B, LEASE_CODE_C, LEASE_CODE_STATUS, CUST_NAME_A, CUST_NAME_B, CUST_NAME_C, CUST_NAME_STATUS, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_A, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_B, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_C, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_STATUS, OPEN_BANK_A, OPEN_BANK_B, OPEN_BANK_C, OPEN_BANK_STATUS, BANK_ACCOUNTS_A, BANK_ACCOUNTS_B, BANK_ACCOUNTS_C, BANK_ACCOUNTS_STATUS, CUST_PHONE_A, CUST_PHONE_B, CUST_PHONE_C, CUST_PHONE_STATUS, CUST_FAX_A, CUST_FAX_B, CUST_FAX_C, CUST_FAX_STATUS, CUST_LINKMAN_A, CUST_LINKMAN_B, CUST_LINKMAN_C, CUST_LINKMAN_STATUS, CUST_ZIP_A, CUST_ZIP_B, CUST_ZIP_C, CUST_ZIP_STATUS,
LEASE_TOPRIC_A, LEASE_TOPRIC_B, LEASE_TOPRIC_C, LEASE_TOPRIC_STATUS, LEASE_PERIOD_A, LEASE_PERIOD_B, LEASE_PERIOD_C, LEASE_PERIOD_STATUS, LEASE_TERM_A, LEASE_TERM_B, LEASE_TERM_C, LEASE_TERM_STATUS, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_A, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_B, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_C, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_STATUS, PLEDGE_PRICE_A, PLEDGE_PRICE_B, PLEDGE_PRICE_C, PLEDGE_PRICE_STATUS, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_A, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_B, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_C, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_STATUS, FLOAT_RATE_A, FLOAT_RATE_B, FLOAT_RATE_C, FLOAT_RATE_STATUS, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_A, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_B, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_C, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_STATUS, YEAR_INTEREST_A, YEAR_INTEREST_B, YEAR_INTEREST_C, YEAR_INTEREST_STATUS, FINE_TYPE_A, FINE_TYPE_B, FINE_TYPE_C, FINE_TYPE_STATUS, FINE_RATE_A, FINE_RATE_B, FINE_RATE_C, FINE_RATE_STATUS, LEASE_RZE_A, LEASE_RZE_B, LEASE_RZE_C, LEASE_RZE_STATUS, PAY_WAY_A, PAY_WAY_B, PAY_WAY_C, PAY_WAY_STATUS, START_DATE_A, START_DATE_B, START_DATE_C, START_DATE_STATUS, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_A, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_B, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_C, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_STATUS, DEAL_WAY_A, DEAL_WAY_B, DEAL_WAY_C, DEAL_WAY_STATUS, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_A, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_B, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_C, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_STATUS, EQUIPMENT_STATUS, INSURE_STATUS, OTHERPRICE_STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER_ID, PLEDGE_WAY_A, PLEDGE_WAY_B, PLEDGE_WAY_C, PLEDGE_WAY_STATUS, SALES_TAX_RATE_A, SALES_TAX_RATE_B, SALES_TAX_RATE_C, SALES_TAX_RATE_STATUS, INSURE_BASE_RATE_A, INSURE_BASE_RATE_B, INSURE_BASE_RATE_C, INSURE_BASE_RATE_STATUS, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_A, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_B, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_C, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_STATUS, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_A, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_B, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_C, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_STATUS, PLEDGE_PERIOD_A, PLEDGE_PERIOD_B, PLEDGE_PERIOD_C, PLEDGE_PERIOD_STATUS, NATU_IDCARD_A, NATU_IDCARD_B, NATU_IDCARD_C, NATU_IDCARD_STATUS, NATU_MATE_NAME_A, NATU_MATE_NAME_B, NATU_MATE_NAME_C, NATU_MATE_NAME_STATUS, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_A, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_B, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_C, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_STATUS, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_A, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_B, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_C, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_STATUS, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_A, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_B, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_C, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_STATUS) values ( #RECT_ID#, #RECC_TYPE#, 0, #LEASE_CODE_A#, #LEASE_CODE_B#, #LEASE_CODE_C#, #LEASE_CODE_STATUS#, #CUST_NAME_A#, #CUST_NAME_B#, #CUST_NAME_C#, #CUST_NAME_STATUS#, #CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_A#, #CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_B#, #CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_C#, #CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_STATUS#, #OPEN_BANK_A#, #OPEN_BANK_B#, #OPEN_BANK_C#, #OPEN_BANK_STATUS#, #BANK_ACCOUNTS_A#, #BANK_ACCOUNTS_B#, #BANK_ACCOUNTS_C#, #BANK_ACCOUNTS_STATUS#, #CUST_PHONE_A#, #CUST_PHONE_B#, #CUST_PHONE_C#, #CUST_PHONE_STATUS#, #CUST_FAX_A#, #CUST_FAX_B#, #CUST_FAX_C#, #CUST_FAX_STATUS#, #CUST_LINKMAN_A#, #CUST_LINKMAN_B#, #CUST_LINKMAN_C#, #CUST_LINKMAN_STATUS#, #CUST_ZIP_A#, #CUST_ZIP_B#, #CUST_ZIP_C#, #CUST_ZIP_STATUS#,
#LEASE_TOPRIC_A#, #LEASE_TOPRIC_B#, #LEASE_TOPRIC_C#, #LEASE_TOPRIC_STATUS#, #LEASE_PERIOD_A#, #LEASE_PERIOD_B#, #LEASE_PERIOD_C#, #LEASE_PERIOD_STATUS#, #LEASE_TERM_A#, #LEASE_TERM_B#, #LEASE_TERM_C#, #LEASE_TERM_STATUS#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_A#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_B#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_C#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_STATUS#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_A#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_B#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_C#, #PLEDGE_PRICE_STATUS#, #BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_A#, #BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_B#, #BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_C#, #BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_STATUS#, #FLOAT_RATE_A#, #FLOAT_RATE_B#, #FLOAT_RATE_C#, #FLOAT_RATE_STATUS#, #YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_A#, #YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_B#, #YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_C#, #YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_STATUS#, #YEAR_INTEREST_A#, #YEAR_INTEREST_B#, #YEAR_INTEREST_C#, #YEAR_INTEREST_STATUS#, #FINE_TYPE_A#, #FINE_TYPE_B#, #FINE_TYPE_C#, #FINE_TYPE_STATUS#, #FINE_RATE_A#, #FINE_RATE_B#, #FINE_RATE_C#, #FINE_RATE_STATUS#, #LEASE_RZE_A#, #LEASE_RZE_B#, #LEASE_RZE_C#, #LEASE_RZE_STATUS#, #PAY_WAY_A#, #PAY_WAY_B#, #PAY_WAY_C#, #PAY_WAY_STATUS#, cast(#START_DATE_A# as datetime), cast(#START_DATE_B# as datetime), cast(#START_DATE_C# as datetime), #START_DATE_STATUS#, #EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_A#, #EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_B#, #EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_C#, #EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_STATUS#, #DEAL_WAY_A#, #DEAL_WAY_B#, #DEAL_WAY_C#, #DEAL_WAY_STATUS#, #INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_A#, #INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_B#, #INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_C#, #INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_STATUS#, #EQUIPMENT_STATUS#, #INSURE_STATUS#, #OTHERPRICE_STATUS#, getdate(), #CREATE_USER_ID#, #PLEDGE_WAY_A#, #PLEDGE_WAY_B#, #PLEDGE_WAY_C#, #PLEDGE_WAY_STATUS#, #SALES_TAX_RATE_A#, #SALES_TAX_RATE_B#, #SALES_TAX_RATE_C#, #SALES_TAX_RATE_STATUS#, #INSURE_BASE_RATE_A#, #INSURE_BASE_RATE_B#, #INSURE_BASE_RATE_C#, #INSURE_BASE_RATE_STATUS#, #STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_A#, #STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_B#, #STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_C#, #STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_STATUS#, #STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_A#, #STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_B#, #STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_C#, #STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_STATUS#, #PLEDGE_PERIOD_A#, #PLEDGE_PERIOD_B#, #PLEDGE_PERIOD_C#, #PLEDGE_PERIOD_STATUS#, #NATU_IDCARD_A#, #NATU_IDCARD_B#, #NATU_IDCARD_C#, #NATU_IDCARD_STATUS#, #NATU_MATE_NAME_A#, #NATU_MATE_NAME_B#, #NATU_MATE_NAME_C#, #NATU_MATE_NAME_STATUS#, #NATU_MATE_IDCARD_A#, #NATU_MATE_IDCARD_B#, #NATU_MATE_IDCARD_C#, #NATU_MATE_IDCARD_STATUS#, #CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_A#, #CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_B#, #CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_C#, #CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_STATUS#, #CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_A#, #CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_B#, #CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_C#, #CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_STATUS#)
sqlMap.select: select top 1 trcc.RECC_ID, trcc.RECT_ID, trcc.RECC_TYPE, trcc.STATUS, LEASE_CODE_A, LEASE_CODE_B, LEASE_CODE_C, LEASE_CODE_STATUS, CUST_NAME_A, CUST_NAME_B, CUST_NAME_C, CUST_NAME_STATUS, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_A, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_B, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_C, CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE_STATUS, OPEN_BANK_A, OPEN_BANK_B, OPEN_BANK_C, OPEN_BANK_STATUS, BANK_ACCOUNTS_A, BANK_ACCOUNTS_B, BANK_ACCOUNTS_C, BANK_ACCOUNTS_STATUS, CUST_PHONE_A, CUST_PHONE_B, CUST_PHONE_C, CUST_PHONE_STATUS, CUST_FAX_A, CUST_FAX_B, CUST_FAX_C, CUST_FAX_STATUS, CUST_LINKMAN_A, CUST_LINKMAN_B, CUST_LINKMAN_C, CUST_LINKMAN_STATUS, CUST_ZIP_A, CUST_ZIP_B, CUST_ZIP_C, CUST_ZIP_STATUS, LEASE_TOPRIC_A, LEASE_TOPRIC_B, LEASE_TOPRIC_C, LEASE_TOPRIC_STATUS, LEASE_PERIOD_A, LEASE_PERIOD_B, LEASE_PERIOD_C, LEASE_PERIOD_STATUS, LEASE_TERM_A, LEASE_TERM_B, LEASE_TERM_C, LEASE_TERM_STATUS, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_A, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_B, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_C, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE_STATUS, PLEDGE_PRICE_A, PLEDGE_PRICE_B, PLEDGE_PRICE_C, PLEDGE_PRICE_STATUS, MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE_A, MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE_B, MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE_C, MANAGEMENT_FEE_RATE_STATUS, MANAGEMENT_FEE_A, MANAGEMENT_FEE_B, MANAGEMENT_FEE_C, MANAGEMENT_FEE_STATUS, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_A, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_B, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_C, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE_STATUS, FLOAT_RATE_A, FLOAT_RATE_B, FLOAT_RATE_C, FLOAT_RATE_STATUS, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_A, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_B, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_C, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE_STATUS, YEAR_INTEREST_A, YEAR_INTEREST_B, YEAR_INTEREST_C, YEAR_INTEREST_STATUS, FINE_TYPE_A, FINE_TYPE_B, FINE_TYPE_C, FINE_TYPE_STATUS, FINE_RATE_A, FINE_RATE_B, FINE_RATE_C, FINE_RATE_STATUS, LEASE_RZE_A, LEASE_RZE_B, LEASE_RZE_C, LEASE_RZE_STATUS, PAY_WAY_A, PAY_WAY_B, PAY_WAY_C, PAY_WAY_STATUS, START_DATE_A, START_DATE_B, START_DATE_C, START_DATE_STATUS, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_A, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_B, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_C, EQUPMENT_ADDRESS_STATUS, DEAL_WAY_A, DEAL_WAY_B, DEAL_WAY_C, DEAL_WAY_STATUS, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_A, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_B, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_C, INSURANCE_COMPANY_ID_STATUS, BUY_INSURANCE_WAY_A, BUY_INSURANCE_WAY_B, BUY_INSURANCE_WAY_C, BUY_INSURANCE_WAY_STATUS, BUY_INSURANCE_TIME_A, BUY_INSURANCE_TIME_B, BUY_INSURANCE_TIME_C, BUY_INSURANCE_TIME_STATUS, trcc.INSURE_REBATE_RATE_A, trcc.INSURE_REBATE_RATE_B, trcc.INSURE_REBATE_RATE_C, trcc.INSURE_REBATE_RATE_STATUS, trcc.EQUIPMENT_STATUS, trcc.INSURE_STATUS, OTHERPRICE_STATUS, trcc.CREATE_DATE, trcc.CREATE_USER_ID, tuu.name, tic1.incp_name incp_name_a, tic2.incp_name incp_name_b, tic3.incp_name incp_name_c, PLEDGE_WAY_A, PLEDGE_WAY_B, PLEDGE_WAY_C, PLEDGE_WAY_STATUS, SALES_TAX_RATE_A, SALES_TAX_RATE_B, SALES_TAX_RATE_C, SALES_TAX_RATE_STATUS, INSURE_BASE_RATE_A, INSURE_BASE_RATE_B, INSURE_BASE_RATE_C, INSURE_BASE_RATE_STATUS, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_A, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_B, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_C, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC_STATUS, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_A, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_B, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_C, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC_STATUS, PLEDGE_PERIOD_A, PLEDGE_PERIOD_B, PLEDGE_PERIOD_C, PLEDGE_PERIOD_STATUS, NATU_IDCARD_A, NATU_IDCARD_B, NATU_IDCARD_C, NATU_IDCARD_STATUS, NATU_MATE_NAME_A, NATU_MATE_NAME_B, NATU_MATE_NAME_C, NATU_MATE_NAME_STATUS, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_A, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_B, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_C, NATU_MATE_IDCARD_STATUS, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_A, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_B, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_C, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS_STATUS, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_A, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_B, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_C, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS_STATUS from t_rent_contractcheck trcc left join t_insu_company tic1 on trcc.insurance_company_id_a = tic1.incp_id left join t_insu_company tic2 on trcc.insurance_company_id_b = tic2.incp_id left join t_insu_company tic3 on trcc.insurance_company_id_c = tic3.incp_id left join t_user_user tuu on tuu.id=trcc.create_user_id where trcc.status = 0 and trcc.recc_type = #recc_type# and trcc.rect_id=#rect_id# order by trcc.recc_id desc
sqlMap.update: update t_rent_contractcheck set status=1 where rect_id=#RECT_ID# and recc_type=2

update T_RENT_CONTRACT set rect_status = 1, lease_code = #LEASE_CODE#, cust_name = #CUST_NAME#, corp_oragnization_code = #CORP_ORAGNIZATION_CODE#, open_bank = #OPEN_BANK#, bank_accounts = #BANK_ACCOUNTS#, cust_phone = #CUST_PHONE#, cust_fax = #CUST_FAX#, cust_linkman = #CUST_LINKMAN#, cust_zip = #CUST_ZIP#, NATU_IDCARD = #NATU_IDCARD#, NATU_MATE_NAME = #NATU_MATE_NAME#, NATU_MATE_IDCARD = #NATU_MATE_IDCARD#, CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS = #CORP_REGISTE_ADDRESS#, CORP_WORK_ADDRESS = #CORP_WORK_ADDRESS# where rect_id = #RECT_ID#

update t_rent_contractschema set lease_topric = #LEASE_TOPRIC#, LEASE_PERIOD = #LEASE_PERIOD#, lease_term = #LEASE_TERM#, PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE = #PLEDGE_PRICE_RATE#, PLEDGE_PRICE = #PLEDGE_PRICE#, BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE = #BUSINESS_TRIP_PRICE#, FLOAT_RATE = #FLOAT_RATE#, YEAR_INTEREST = #YEAR_INTEREST#, YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE = #YEAR_INTEREST_TYPE#, FINE_RATE = #FINE_RATE#, FINE_TYPE = #FINE_TYPE#, LEASE_RZE = #LEASE_RZE#, PAY_WAY = #PAY_WAY#, START_DATE = CONVERT(datetime,#START_DATE#), EQUPMENT_ADDRESS = #EQUPMENT_ADDRESS#, DEAL_WAY = #DEAL_WAY#,
PLEDGE_PERIOD = #PLEDGE_PERIOD#, SALES_TAX_RATE = #SALES_TAX_RATE#, INSURE_BASE_RATE = #INSURE_BASE_RATE#, STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC = #STAMP_TAX_TOPRIC#, STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC = #STAMP_TAX_MONTHPRIC# where status=0 and rect_id=#RECT_ID#
update T_RENT_CONTRACT set rect_status = 2 where rect_id = #RECT_ID#
